text.section:
Employment is presumed to be covered employment if:
regardless of whether the employment is based on the common law relation of master and servant, the employment is performed:
for wages; or
under a contract of hire that is written or oral or express or implied; and
the employment is performed in accordance with § 8-202 of this subtitle.

To overcome the presumption of employment, an employing unit shall establish that the person performing services is an independent contractor in accordance with § 8-205 of this subtitle or is specifically exempted under this subtitle.
